hiveArticle.title: Do Clouds Dance? See it Yourself
hiveArticle.body:
Have you ever seen clouds dancing, I have seen it today. Just look at the below photos and think why I am saying the clouds were dancing today. They were all over the sky, and it looks like every cloud came together to dance on a wedding party.

<hr>

### Original One

<hr>

![IMG_20171106_134915.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1509962092/pcdv9lseernfuqyup27k.jpg)

<hr>

### After Editing

<hr>

![IMG_20171106_134915~2.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1509962110/tyhvkritiy8zz50d3soc.jpg)

<hr>

### Black and White

<hr>

![IMG_20171106_134915-3.jpg](https://res.cloudinary.com/hpiynhbhq/image/upload/v1509968840/clmdpwi6psf9knue0fps.jpg)

Please let me know which one you liked the most.

<hr>
### Follow @codingdefined
<hr>
